content.en: 3D sketch manipulation: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can be used to interpret and manipulate 3D sketches, modify the topology of 3D models, reconstruct 3D geometry from 2D sketches, construct complex 3D models from 2D silhouettes, convert paper sketches into 3D shapes, explore and visualize unstructured collections of design sketches, and perform CAD modeling through sketching. These algorithms are able to infer, modify, reconstruct, convert, and transform sketches to create visually pleasing and accurate 3D representations.
content.da: 3D-skitsemanipulation: Forskere udforsker, hvordan algoritmer kan bruges til at fortolke og manipulere 3D-skitser, ændre topologien af 3D-modeller, rekonstruere 3D-geometri fra 2D-skitser, konstruere komplekse 3D-modeller fra 2D-silhuetter, konvertere papirskitser til 3D-former, udforske og visualisere ustrukturerede samlinger af designskitser, og udføre CAD-modellering gennem skitsering. Disse algoritmer er i stand til at udlede, ændre, rekonstruere, konvertere og transformere skitser for at skabe visuelt tiltalende og nøjagtige 3D-repræsentationer.
